alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fillmore; Mower; Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 11:36AM CST until December 09 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times, followed by freezing drizzle. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Iowa and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Confidence is growing for freezing drizzle to spread across the area behind the snowfall. With snow already on the ground impacts will be limited, but slippery stretches could develop on untreated surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
